page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT - NEWTOWN
page.content: Employment in this area is not that good. Most of the people work in shops or do cleaning jobs. Some of the people work in factories because there are a few factories in this area. Young students who have been kicked out of college or university and do not get proper jobs work in shops in the town centre or in the little shops at the end of the roads. They are desparate for money and will take any job they are offered. Most people in this area are lucky and get jobs in the offices and then become very important while others struggle for jobs and meanwhile live on 'junk' food. Most things have become very expensive now and some people cannot afford them when others can. In our area most have poor jobs and do not have enough money to pay their expenses. by Sarbjit Kaur.
